tasks.server:start: docker run -d --name playwright-server -p 3000:3000 --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway --init --workdir /home/pwuser --user pwuser mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.55.0-noble /bin/sh -c "npx -y playwright@1.55.0 run-server --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0"
tasks.e2e:ci: deno task server:start && sleep 2 && CI=1 deno task playwright test --reporter=line,html; deno task server:stop
tasks.verify: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check
